question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/types/src/instr.rs] [Function: From<Bytecode>::from()] [Type confusion] Can an attacker craft malicious Bytecode variants that exploit missing validation during conversion to Instruction, potentially causing type confusion in the VM interpreter leading to arbitrary memory access? (Critical)
